alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:37PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Essex, northeastern Worcester and northern Middlesex Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 837 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fitchburg to near West Boylston. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Lowell, Lawrence, Waltham, Medford, Methuen, Arlington, Leominster, Fitchburg, Billerica, Marlborough, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Reading and Burlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester
